body:
Title is a mouthful, but with some magic Slicorn/xArcturus/BrokenVacuum fixed it. Basically when you hit someone at the last second once you die, it will kill them too so there's no more 'lose a couple hearts'. This was a pretty big flaw and happened almost every time to me at least, so... OiTN is now safe.

OiTN = One hit kill maps/One in the nebula. Just a little update since it occurred so often (thank you vacuuuuumm)
